---
description: 'Learn how to request funds from the faucet to an account output.'

  - how to
  - wallet
  - get funds
  - faucet
  - account output

import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs';
import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';

# Request Funds From the Faucet

## Example Code

<Tabs groupId="language" queryString>
<TabItem value="rust" label="Rust">

1. Instantiate a [Wallet]((https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html) and [sync it](../wallet/check-balance.mdx).
2. Retrieve the first [`AccountId`]((https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/types/block/output/account/struct.AccountId.html) from the
    [`Balance`]((https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/types/struct.Balance.html) by calling
    the [`Balance.accounts()`]((https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/types/struct.Balance.html#method.accounts) function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/account_output/request_funds.rs#L41
```

</div>

3. Get the [`AccountAddress`]((https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/types/block/address/struct.AccountAddress.html)
    for the `AccountId` that was retrieved in step 2, and transform it to Bech32 using the
    [`AccountAddress.toBech32()`]((https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/types/block/address/account/struct.AccountAddress.html#method.to_bech32)
    function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/account_output/request_funds.rs#L45
```

</div>

4. Request funds from the faucet by calling the [`Utils.request_funds_from_faucet()`]((https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/client/utils/fn.request_funds_from_faucet.html)
    function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/account_output/request_funds.rs#L46
```

</div>
</TabItem>
<TabItem value="typescript-node" label="Typescript (Node.js)">

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Wallet.md) and [sync it](../wallet/check-balance.mdx).
2. Retrieve the first [`AccountOutput`](../../references/nodejs/classes/AccountOutput.md) from the
    [`Balance`](../../references/nodejs/interfaces/Balance.md) by accessing
    the [`Balance.accounts](../../references/nodejs/interfaces/Balance.md#accounts) property.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/account_output/request-funds.ts#L38
```

</div>

3. Get the [`AccountAddress`](../../references/nodejs/classes/AccountAddress.md)
    for the `AccountId` that was retrieved in step 2, and transform it to Bech32 using the
    [`Utils.accountIdToBech32()`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Utils.md#accountidtobech32)
    function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/account_output/request-funds.ts#L44-L47
```

</div>

4. Request funds from the faucet by calling the [`Client.requestFundsFromFaucet()`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Client.md#requestfundsfromfaucet)
function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/account_output/request-funds.ts#L49-L52
```

</div>

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="python" label="Python">

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/wallet.md) and [sync it](../wallet/check-balance.mdx).
2. Retrieve the first [`AccountOutput`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/types/output.md#accountoutput-objects) from the
    [`Balance`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/types/balance.md) by accessing
    the `Balance.accounts` attribute.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/account_output/request_funds.py#L26
```

</div>

3. Get the [`AccountAddress`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/types/address.md#accountaddress-objects)
for the `AccountId` that was retrieved in step 2, and transform it to Bech32 using the
[`Utils.account_id_to_bech32()`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/utils.md#account_id_to_bech32)
function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/account_output/request_funds.py#L30-L31
```

</div>

4. Request funds from the faucet by calling the [`Client.request_funds_from_faucet()`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/client/_utils.md#request_funds_from_faucet)
function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/account_output/request_funds.py#L32-L33
```

</div>

</TabItem>
</Tabs>
